## RISmed

* [Tutorial](http://www.edii.uclm.es/~useR-2013/Tutorials/kovalchik/kovalchik_meta_tutorial.pdf), [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/RISmed/index.html)

```{r}
## load library RISmed
library(RISmed)

## search for all intelligence related publications in pubmed 
### specify search terms and database
(fit <- EUtilsSummary("Intelligence[Mesh] OR  Intelligence Tests[Mesh]", db = "pubmed"))

### extract the translated query
QueryTranslation(fit) 

### extract the number of matched records
summary(fit)
QueryCount(fit) 

## search for all publications in pubmed for each year from 

```



* Create EUtilsSummary object for specified query
* Retrieve matching records with EUtilsGet

EUtilsSummary( [query], [db], [search.limits])
library(RISmed)
fit <- EUtilsSummary("rofecoxib[ti]+British Medical Journal[jo]", db = "pubmed")


fetch <- EUtilsGet(fit)
